name: Mahjong3D - Shanghai Mahjong Deluxe
description:
"Mahjong3D - Shanghai Mahjong Deluxe" is a relaxing, minimal, matching game.
Your goal is to remove all tiles by pairs.

Features:
- Real 3D tiles
- 160+ different layouts
- Global leaderboards
- Hint, undo and shuffle board options
- Highlight free tiles
- Autosave when exit or take a call
- No interference with music player
